snippet.title: Barotrauma "Embrace The Abyss" Update Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/602960/Barotrauma/
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/barotrauma

Barotrauma: Embrace The Abyss Update is NOW LIVE!

Abyss Monsters - Abandoned Outposts - New Missions - Improved New Player Experience - Optional Radiation Mechanic for the Campaign Map - And more!

--------------------------------

Barotrauma is a cooperative multiplayer submarine simulator - in space!

https://barotraumagame.com/
Brought to you by FakeFish, Undertow Games and Daedalic Entertainment.

-- About the Game --
Overcome crisis and the unrelenting pressure of a frozen ocean. Flee or fight alien lifeforms, explore a strange new world in Jupiter’s orbit, command your crew and craft equipment in a tense 2D experience. 

-- Developed by FakeFish --
https://www.fakefishgames.com/#home

-- Follow us on Social Media -- 
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/daedalic 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/daedalic 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/daedalicentertainment

https://www.daedalic.com
